title: Dynamics of the securities market in the information asymmetry context: developing a methodology for emerging securities markets. (arXiv:2307.04140v1 [econ.GN])
abstract: Developing a system of indicators that reflects the degree to which the securities market fulfils its key functions, is essential to assess the level of its development. In the conditions of asymmetric information it can also provide effective policies for securities market development. This paper is aimed to develop a set of indicators to assess the securities market performance, especially in the asymmetric information context. To this goal, we selected the Russian securities market as a case of asymmetric information context, in comparison with other post-Soviet countries, to investigate its success and failure in fulfilling its key functions. Regarding this, we developed research hypotheses and we conducted a normative research method, based on an ideal model of market functioning that is used as a criterion for testing the hypotheses. translated_title: 信息不对称背景下的证券市场动态：发展新兴证券市场的方法研究
translated_abstract: 发展一个反映证券市场履行关键功能程度的指标体系对于评估其发展水平至关重要。在信息不对称的条件下，它还可以提供有效的证券市场发展政策。本文旨在发展一套指标来评估证券市场的绩效，特别是在信息不对称的背景下。为此，我们选择了俄罗斯证券市场作为信息不对称背景的案例，与其他后苏联国家进行比较，调查其在履行关键功能方面的成功和失败。在此基础上，我们提出了研究假设，并采用一种理论研究方法，根据市场理论模型作为检验假设的标准。研究结果提供了一个评估证券市场绩效的原始评分标准。研究结果还有助于从业人员的决策。
tldr: 本文开发了一套指标体系来评估信息不对称背景下证券市场的绩效，为证券市场发展提供了有效的政策，并通过对俄罗斯证券市场的案例研究，提供了一个评估证券市场绩效的原始评分标准。
en_tdlr: This paper develops a set of indicators to assess the performance of the securities market in the context of information asymmetry, providing effective policies for market development. Through a case study of the Russian securities market, it offers an original scale for evaluating its performance.
